QuestData.Title: I Heard You Lost the Herd
QuestData.Description:
Our herd of alpacas went missing dis morning.
It may seem like we have more pressing matters to worry about, but de meat and milk de alpacas provide are essential to our survival.
Those alpacas won't survive long on de dunes. Speak with Mugjabu and help him find de alpacas before it's too late!
